verbs.description: [ARG0: i] [V: tried] [ARG1: 3 ways to get crayon off my walls] [ARGM-TMP: when my toddler scribbled all over my apartment walls with crayon i freaked and then i found out a foolproof way to remove the crayon marks from my walls walls crayon]
